message: Bob, I'm delighted to offer you this exceptional product. I believe it's worth $800000 to you, and I'm confident it will be a valuable asset to your business. To start, I'm proposing a price of $850000. This price reflects the product's unique value and my confidence in our potential partnership.
Alice, thank you for your offer. Considering the value of the product and my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $799999 for the product.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. While I value our potential partnership, I'm unable to accept a price that's significantly below the product's true worth.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $825000. This price reflects the product's unique value and the potential benefits it can bring to your business. I believe this is a fair compromise and a great opportunity for us both.
Alice, I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget and the value I place on the product, I would like to propose a price of $800000 for the product.
